channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [WFLY-1377] Quickstart wicket-ear throws exceptions for injecting resource defined in web.xml with @Resource
item.description:
The wicket-ear quickstart throws exception on visiting the home page (http://localhost:8080/jboss-as-wicket-ear-war/).

Removing @Resource(name = "welcomeMessage") and assign a value directly to String welcome in ListContacts.java solved the issue.

Suspect: the resource defined in web.xml is not found.

Remarks:
The quickstart works on JBossAS 7.1.1.Final.

item.summary: Quickstart wicket-ear throws exceptions for injecting resource defined in web.xml with @Resource

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
1) Download the quickstart zip from http://download.jboss.org/wildfly/8.0.0.Alpha1/quickstart-8.0.0.Alpha1.zip
2) Start the WildFly 8.0.0.Alpha1 Server
3) Deploy the wicket-ear to the server
4) Launch the application on the browser
5) The application returned 500 - Internal Server Error
6) Observe in server log the exceptions thrown
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.jboss.as.weld.services.bootstrap.AbstractResourceInjectionServices$1.createResource(AbstractResourceInjectionServices.java:109) [wildfly-weld-8.0.0.Alpha1.jar:8.0.0.Alpha1]

Expected:
No exceptions should be thrown
